title: Boo: Little Dog in the Big City
description: Everyone’s favorite dog is back and cuter than ever! Following up on the internationally bestselling The Life of the World’s Cutest Dog, this latest volume features Boo’s adventures in the big city. Get ready for tons of all-new irresistible photos of Boo going shopping, hitting the beach, making doggy friends, and just generally being adorable. Plus, this is a fixed-format version of the book, which looks nearly identical to the print version.
author: J.H. Lee
